Class TxHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • TxHandler

  • public class TxHandler
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TxHandler(UTXOPool utxoPool)
      Creates a public ledger whose current UTXOPool (collection of unspent transaction outputs) is utxoPool.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Transaction[] handleTxs(Transaction[] possibleTxs)
      Handles each epoch by receiving an unordered array of proposed transactions, checking each transaction for correctness, returning a mutually valid array of accepted transactions, and updating the current UTXO pool as appropriate.
      boolean isValidTx(Transaction tx) 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TxHandler

        public TxHandler(UTXOPool utxoPool)
        Creates a public ledger whose current UTXOPool (collection of unspent transaction outputs) is utxoPool. This should make a copy of utxoPool by using the UTXOPool(UTXOPool uPool) constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • handleTxs

        public Transaction[] handleTxs(Transaction[] possibleTxs)
        Handles each epoch by receiving an unordered array of proposed transactions, checking each transaction for correctness, returning a mutually valid array of accepted transactions, and updating the current UTXO pool as appropriate.

      • isValidTx

        public boolean isValidTx(Transaction tx)
        Returns:
        true if: (1) all outputs claimed by tx are in the current UTXO pool, (2) the signatures on each input of tx are valid, (3) no UTXO is claimed multiple times by tx, (4) all of txs output values are non-negative, and (5) the sum of txs input values is greater than or equal to the sum of its output values; and false otherwise.
